title: Paris by Night 88
text:
Paris By Night 88: Lam Phương - Đường Về Quê Hương ("The Road Back to my homeland") is a "<a href="Paris%20By%20Night">Paris By Night</a>" program produced by <a href="Th%C3%BAy%20Nga">Thúy Nga</a> that was filmed at the <a href="Hobby%20Center%20for%20the%20Performing%20Arts">Hobby Center for the Performing Arts</a> in <a href="Houston">Houston</a>, <a href="Texas">Texas</a> on Saturday, May 5, 2007. It is a direct continuation of ' and ', that was released several years earlier. This program was codenamed, "In Houston 2" (which was thought to be a successor to "<a href="Paris%20By%20Night%2036">Paris By Night 36: In Houston</a>", before the title was announced). Before the main subject title was announced, the program was then codenamed to "In Houston 2: Lam Phương 3" (the third Lam Phương series). The "three" was scrapped off the title and the subject was simply, "Lam Phương".
Vietnamese composer, <a href="Lam%20Ph%C6%B0%C6%A1ng">Lam Phương</a>, is one of the Vietnamese community's most famous composers today; composing famous songs before and even after the <a href="Vietnam%20War">Vietnam War</a>, and the <a href="Fall%20of%20Saigon">Fall of Saigon</a> in 1975. Since the early years of "Paris By Night", Thúy Nga has been making single-composer videos dedicated to just a single composer. Starting in <a href="Paris%20By%20Night%2064">Paris By Night 64: Ðêm Văn Nghệ Thính Phòng</a> however, Thuy Nga introduced the three-composer format. That trend continued in "<a href="Paris%20By%20Night%2066">Paris By Night 66: Người Tình và Quê Hương</a>", ', ', "<a href="Paris%20By%20Night%2078">Paris By Night 78: Ðường Xưa</a>", and finally in "<a href="Paris%20By%20Night%2083">Paris By Night 83: Những Khúc Hát Ân Tình</a>". However, composer Lam Phương is an exception. After being beloved by many, and his songs are in a timeless label, Thúy Nga thought that he should deserve the entire program just dedicated to him and his songs, in a program that was meant for three composers.
"Paris By Night 88" is Thúy Nga's third live-performance show, after "<a href="Paris%20By%20Night%2086">Paris By Night 86</a>" and "<a href="Paris%20By%20Night%2087">87</a>", which was the PBN Talent Show. This is a trend that Thúy Nga may be beginning to adapt, after years of having singers <a href="lip-sync">lip-sync</a> on stage, a practice that is common and accepted in the Vietnamese music community.
"Paris By Night 88" used famous songs that was originally performed in "Paris By Night 28" and "Paris By Night 22", which were part of the Lam Phương series.
This is also director <a href="Alan%20Carter%20%28director%29">Alan Carter</a>'s first direction of "Paris By Night", in place of its regular director, Michael Watt after many years. Carter has been credited to many successful programs, including the 2007 <a href="Miss%20America">Miss America</a> Pageant, the 2007 <a href="CMT%20Music%20Awards">CMT Music Awards</a>, and the 2005 <a href="Miss%20Universe">Miss Universe</a> Pageant.
Track list.
Disc 1
01. Đoàn Người Lữ Thứ - <a href="Th%E1%BA%BF%20S%C6%A1n">Thế Sơn</a>, Trần Thái Hòa, Lương Tùng Quang, <a href="D%C6%B0%C6%A1ng%20Tri%E1%BB%87u%20V%C5%A9">Dương Triệu Vũ</a>, Trịnh Lam, Huy Tâm, <a href="T%C3%A2m%20%C4%90oan">Tâm Đoan</a>, <a href="H%C6%B0%C6%A1ng%20Th%E1%BB%A7y%20%28singer%29">Hương Thủy</a>, Ngọc Liên, Ngọc Loan, Quỳnh Vi, Hương Giang
02. Kiếp Nghèo - <a href="%C3%9D%20Lan">Ý Lan</a>
03. Thành Phố Buồn, Tình Như Mây Khói - Chế Linh, Mai Quốc Huy
04. Tiễn Người Đi - Hương Lan
05. Bức Tâm Thư - <a href="Nh%C6%B0%20Loan">Như Loan</a>, Ngọc Loan
06. Chiều Tàn - Hoàng Oanh
07. Biết Đến Bao Giờ, Đêm Tiền Đồn - Mạnh Quỳnh, Trường Vũ
08. Ngày Hạnh Phúc - <a href="T%C3%A2m%20%C4%90oan">Tâm Đoan</a>, <a href="H%C6%B0%C6%A1ng%20Th%E1%BB%A7y%20%28singer%29">Hương Thủy</a>, <a href="Minh%20Tuy%E1%BA%BFt">Minh Tuyết</a>, Ngọc Liên
09. Nghẹn Ngào - <a href="Kh%C3%A1nh%20H%C3%A0">Khánh Hà</a>
10. Phút Cuối - <a href="B%E1%BA%B1ng%20Ki%E1%BB%81u">Bằng Kiều</a>
11. Em Đi Rồi - Họa Mi
12. Musical : Chuyện Tình Thời Chinh Chiến 
- <a href="Nh%C6%B0%20Qu%E1%BB%B3nh%20%28singer%29">Như Quỳnh</a>, <a href="Th%E1%BA%BF%20S%C6%A1n">Thế Sơn</a> & Supporting by: Lương Tùng Quang, Trịnh Lam, Huy Tâm & Quỳnh Vi
13. Chuyến Đò Vỹ Tuyến - <a href="T%C3%A2m%20%C4%90oan">Tâm Đoan</a>
14. Đường Về Quê Hương - <a href="Quang%20L%C3%AA">Quang Lê</a>
Disc 2
15. Nắng Đẹp Miền Nam, Khúc Ca Ngày Mùa - <a href="H%C3%A0%20Ph%C6%B0%C6%A1ng">Hà Phương</a>, <a href="H%C6%B0%C6%A1ng%20Th%E1%BB%A7y%20%28singer%29">Hương Thủy</a>
16. Skit : Lầm - <a href="Ho%C3%A0i%20Linh">Hoài Linh</a>, <a href="Ch%C3%AD%20T%C3%A0i">Chí Tài</a>
17. Say, Lầm - <a href="D%C6%B0%C6%A1ng%20Tri%E1%BB%87u%20V%C5%A9">Dương Triệu Vũ</a>, Trịnh Lam
18. Cho Em Quên Tuổi Ngọc - Bạch Yến, <a href="Tr%E1%BA%A7n%20Thu%20H%C3%A0">Trần Thu Hà</a>
19. Ngày Em Đi - Nguyễn Hưng
20. Liên Khúc : 
- Bảo Hân, , Lương Tùng Quang
21. Liên Khúc : 
- Trần Thái Hòa, Ngọc Liên
22. Bài Tango Cho Em - <a href="Kh%C3%A1nh%20Ly">Khánh Ly</a>
23. Mùa Thu Yêu Đương - Huy Tâm, Quỳnh Vi
24. Chờ Người - Bằng Kiều, <a href="Tr%E1%BA%A7n%20Thu%20H%C3%A0">Trần Thu Hà</a>
25. Mình Mất Nhau Bao Giờ - <a href="Minh%20Tuy%E1%BA%BFt">Minh Tuyết</a>
26. Một Mình - Hương Giang
